comments.html:
Few comments...

1. DHCPv6 server shouldn't be a must on LAN side. In SLAAC there is some sort of RDNS (Recursive DNS) provisioning option. Some hw already supports this option (like Mikrotik router :)

2. You said "someone finally realized". Well, that "someone" is Ole Troan from Cisco Norway, he is also editor of WT192 broadband forum paper, that deals with IPv6 requirements for CPE (same stuff as here). He is very good guy, knows exactly what he is talking about. Sometimes we exchange an opinion or two :)

Jan
